an5.21:1.1: “Mendicants, it’s simply impossible for a disrespectful and irreverent mendicant with incompatible lifestyle to fulfill the practice dealing with supplementary regulations regarding their spiritual companions.
an5.21:1.2: Without fulfilling the practice dealing with supplementary regulations, it’s impossible to fulfill the practice of a trainee.
an5.21:1.3: Without fulfilling the practice of a trainee, it’s impossible to fulfill ethics.
an5.21:1.4: Without fulfilling ethics, it’s impossible to fulfill right view.
an5.21:1.5: Without fulfilling right view, it’s impossible to fulfill right immersion.
an5.21:2.1: But it is possible for a respectful and reverent mendicant with compatible lifestyle to fulfill the practice dealing with supplementary regulations regarding their spiritual companions.
an5.21:2.2: Having fulfilled the practice dealing with supplementary regulations, it’s possible to fulfill the practice of a trainee.
an5.21:2.3: Having fulfilled the practice of a trainee, it’s possible to fulfill ethics.
an5.21:2.4: Having fulfilled ethics, it’s possible to fulfill right view.
an5.21:2.5: Having fulfilled right view, it’s possible to fulfill right immersion.”
